text: Make the Cowboy Robots Cry is an EP by American alt-country band Beachwood Sparks, released in 2002, which featured the return of drummer Jimi Hey. ==Track listing== #"Drinkswater" – 7:12 #"Hibernation" – 3:27 #"Ponce de Leon Blues" – 6:55 #"Sing Your Thoughts" – 3:52 #"Galapagos" – 4:17 #"Ghost Dance 1492" – 2:58 ==References== Category:Beachwood Sparks albums Category:2002 EPs Category:Sub Pop EPs
title: Make the Cowboy Robots Cry
